item.title: Championing Food Sovereignty: Agroecology and Rural Resilience with Dr. Peter Rosset
item.description: Join us as we welcome the insightful Dr. Peter Rosset, an esteemed agroecologist and activist embedded in the heart of Central America. Dr. Rosset brings his wealth of experience with La Via Campesina—a formidable global social movement uniting over 200 million rural families—to our discussion. Together, we dissect the pivotal role this movement plays in championing indigenous rights and food sovereignty while defending nature, rural life, and equitable access to land... Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/poorprolesalmanac/feed.xml

item.title: Would like to experience a significant boost in productivity and profitability?
item.description: Would like to experience a significant boost in productivity and profitability?If you answered, YES, I would like to experience a significant boost in productivity and profitability, I know you will… Feed: https://feedpress.me/goal_setting_systems
